item.title: CENTRE THEATER WEBSITE
item.description: Built the university theaterâ€™s inventory management system with teammates. Designed database schema. Designed and implemented user management system. Implemented the full-text searching feature of the system which allows users to easily locate the costume they want without using the filters. Responsible for bug fixing, system maintenance, and customer support until graduation.
